episode: I was devasted when I could not find a job after college.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was devasted when I could not find a job after college.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. It must have been really tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, I worked so hard and got good grades in school.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must have been so frustrating.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I got good grades in high school and college.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You put in so much effort.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It cost a ton of money too.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That adds even more pressure.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I sent out tons of resumes with no responses.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really discouraging.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I felt like I was lied to and deceived.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's completely understandable.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I felt like a failure.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're not a failure.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was also really mad at the world.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a valid feeling.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Like that they purposely ripped me off and lied to me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds so unfair.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I had done all that work and wasted all that money for nothing.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's so disheartening.
